pages.text: $(l)Astikor Carts Redux: Horse-Drawn Utility$() $(br2)Astikor Carts Redux adds horse-drawn carts to Minecraft, making travel and farming much easier. Hitch up your horse, llama, or mule and hit the road in style!

$(l)Available Carts$() $(br2)- $(l)Plow Cart$(): Till a 3x3 area of land at once. $(br2)- $(l)Storage Cart$(): Carry extra items while traveling. $(br2)- $(l)Animal Cart$(): Bring your furry friends along on your journey.
$(l)How to Hitch Your Horse$() $(br2)To hitch your horse to a cart, simply right-click on the cart with a Lead while your horse is nearby. Ready your cart and enjoy the journey!
